description: All aboard the gain train! They're bringing you the lastest and greatest in performance apparel: the all-new Gainmaker 2N1 Short. Designed for all types of training - from weights to rowing, rock climbing two yoga - this versatile multi-sport short will have you posting PB's in no time. Equipped with semi-compression Kinetic Mesh liner and the BallPark Pouch, guys will enjoy a full range of motion and performance-level sport. Lightweight, breathable and moisture-wicking, sweat doesn't stand a chance in this absolute unit of short.
name: Saxx Underwear Gainmaker 2n1 Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
